name: Deorsus
description:
A WIP game made in GDevelop.

Brought to Hell for unknown reasons, you pass through various trials to get back to the surface.

  • WASD to move, left click to shoot.
  • ESC to pause, F on pause for Full screen. (then select resume and press enter to avoid cancelling full screen with ESC)

4/27/21 - added 'boss' and ending to trial 3. need SFX and maybe a difficulty drop for the whole trial. more memory based for me, at this point.

4/26/21 - on trial 3, the "demo" ends when a very buggy boss spawns. I haven't gotten further than this, yet.
